name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hulu Stream TV shows & movies Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stream TV shows, films, and discover the award-winning classics, blockbuster movies, and exclusive Originals that set Hulu apart. From dramas like Shōgun to the fancy proposals of The Bachelor, your next obsession is just a click away.





















































hulu.com is a simple and intuitive Chrome extension that allows you to adjust the brightness of the hulu.com website using an easy-to-use slider. With this extension, you can customize the website’s brightness to suit your preferences, enhancing your browsing comfort, especially in low-light conditions!

Features:

Brightness Adjustment: Use the slider to easily change the brightness level of the hulu.com website from 10% to 100%, allowing you to tailor visibility to your needs.
Quick Access: The extension is easily accessible directly from the browser toolbar. Click the icon to open the slider in a popup window, enabling quick brightness adjustments.
